item.title: dns
item.description: Record A 192.0.2.1 CNAME hostname.example.com SRV 10 5 80 hostname.example.com 각각 우선순위, 가중치, 포트를 나타냄.

item.title: http
item.description: HTTP/1.1 Issue Head-of-line blocking, HoL Single request / connection Request must be responded in order, FIFO No optimised well Uncompressed headers Redundant headers Lack of Server-side push SPDY&HTTP2 Multiplexed streams Multiple stream over single TCP connection Request Prioritization HTTP header compression HPACK format Huffman code Server Push TCP/TLS Issue HoL TCP 3-way handshaking TLS negotiation handshaking Large backoff on packet loss Poor perforamnce in mobile QUIC Quick UDP Internet Connections
